update T_Option
[Action] = #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
[Option] = #{option,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionValue = #{optionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

Account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
[Time] = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where fId = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update T_Option set [Action] = #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, [Option] = #{option,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionValue = #{optionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, [Time] = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where fId = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into T_Option ([Action], [Option], optionValue, Bz, Creator, Account, [Time]) values
(#{item.action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.option,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.optionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select OptionValue from T_Option(nolock) where Action = #{actionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
